name: Anda: The Egg Toss Game
description:
Reach the top! Reach to the top of the level with a dozen eggs or a few and don't get screwed in this awesome Egg Toss Game from Liquicool. Jump

Jump is the key to moving, or Spacebar. Keep Jumping from BASKET TO BASKET till you reach the final basket of the level with the signboard that says "WINNER". Only few were able to reach that point.

Save the Hen's eggs

The hen has only a dozen eggs for you, you can't just kill all his chicks inside the eggs. Jump precisely and fulfill the desire of the eggs to reach the top without just wasting all the eggs at one basket.

Unlock Eggs and Baskets

Unlock different eggs and baskets like the green spotty egg or the pot basket and make the aesthetics of your level more personalized for yourself.

Enjoy!

Do anything in the game to make yourself enjoy it. 

The game also has different backgrounds to choose from.  Anda : The Egg Toss Game also features very customizable audio settings and supports all the common screen resolutions in potrait mode. You can use Spacebar or Left Mouse Button to Play the Game as it is very simple to start but hard to master. 

The game is also planned to release in Game Jolt soon.
